subsections.title: Training and Capacity Building
subsections.content: Train staff and program managers on financial procedures, budgeting, and financial management to ensure proper financial practices throughout the organization.

subsections.title: Risk Management
subsections.content: Identify financial risks and propose mitigation strategies. Assess potential financial implications of various decisions and provide recommendations.

subsections.title: Grant Proposal Support
subsections.content: Collaborate with program teams to prepare financial components of grant proposals, including budgets and financial narratives.

subsections.title: Fundraising Support
subsections.content: Assist with financial data and reporting requirements for fundraising activities and donor meetings.
